content:
That's perfect! A heartfelt note with a personal message will make the gift even more special and meaningful to Emma. Mentioning your excitement to meet Charlotte and watching her grow up will surely bring a smile to Emma's face. And it's lovely that you're sharing your experience at your cousin Rachel's baby shower - it's a great way to connect and share in the joy of new motherhood.

You're welcome for the help! It was my pleasure to assist you in finding the perfect gift for Emma and Charlotte. I hope you have a wonderful time giving them the gift and catching up with Emma. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything else.

Remember to take a moment to cherish the special moments with Emma and Charlotte - they grow up so fast, and it's wonderful that you're there to support and celebrate with them.
